name: Table Top Gear
description:
This game was complete with the collaboration of my 8 year old daughter, Zoë. It too about 50 hours to make. The entire development of the game can be seen live here:

Follow this playlist's videos to learn how to make Table Top Gear yourself!

Game features:
- Complete game loop, with all screens necessary for the experience
- 2 to 8 players in local multiplayer
- 33 different event cards to spice each turn up

Want to have fun with friends? All you need is local friends, a reasonably modern computer, a Windows OS and a mouse!
